caption: The video shows a masked robber breaking into a house with a gun and asking two women if they know where the elderly man is. The women said the robbers came to the wrong place. The next scene in the video shows an elderly man mourning someone by laying flowers in a cemetery. Two women tried to free themselves from the robbers and save themselves. One woman was shot and the other woman fought with the robbers. A black police officer had been driving to the house, not knowing that there were robbers, he opened the door to enter the house, and was shot by the robbers.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, acient, modern, or in the future?

what time does the video take place?(at day time or night time?)
